youtube.title: Period Day 1: Inside View | Menstrual Cycle Animation
youtube.description: Watch this detailed 3D medical animation showing the internal process of the uterus on Day 1 of the menstrual cycle. Learn how the endometrial lining sheds and the science behind your period. Perfect for biology students and health awareness.
